methods.description: Get a set of recommendations for an aggregation independent of the user's listening history

parameters.name: aggId
parameters.description: ID of an aggregation such as a program or podcast. If the specified ID is a program that publishes rundowns, the latest rundown will be returned.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: startNum
parameters.description: The result to start with. Allows paging through the episodes of a podcast or program, with the default, `startNum=0`, being the most recent episode. Ignored for programs that publish a rundown.

responses.description: An array of audio recommendations with additional metadata about the aggregation they are associated with

methods.description: Get a list of recommendations from a category of content from an organization

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: ID of an organization, such as an NPR One station

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: One of the three categories of content - newscast, story, or podcast

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

responses.description: An array of a certain category of audio recommendations from a provider

methods.description: Collect new ratings for media previously recommended to the logged-in user

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: X-Advertising-ID
parameters.description: A device-specific advertising identifier, if possible. Apple's IDFA is an example.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Determines the focus of the recommendations returned. Channel `npr` is recommended for most use cases.

parameters.name: recommend
parameters.description: If set to `false`, this call will return a blank document; otherwise it will return a new recommendation object

responses.description: A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call

methods.description: Get a list of media for the logged-in user from NPR's recommendation engine

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: X-Advertising-ID
parameters.description: A device-specific advertising identifier, if possible. Apple's IDFA is an example.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Determines the focus of the recommendations returned. Channel `npr` is recommended for most use cases.

parameters.name: sharedMediaId
parameters.description: This media was shared directly with the user; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list

parameters.name: notifiedMediaId
parameters.description: The user received a push notification about this media; if provided, the service will add this recommendation to the top of the list

responses.description: A Collection.doc+JSON representation of an error result from an API call

methods.description: Get a list of recent audio and aggregation items associated with search terms

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your access token from the Authorization Service. Should start with `Bearer`, followed by a space, followed by the token.

parameters.name: searchTerms
parameters.description: Search terms to search on; can include URL-encoded punctuation

responses.description: An array of aggregation or audio recommendations
